title: Little question about the snowdown legendary gifts
body: I remember hearing that when you buy a legendary skin, for a limited time you would also get a mystery gift as well. I bought dragon rider tristana and i was wondering when i would get the mystery gift?

replies.body:
Hey atodtniasiht,

Dragon Trainer Tristana is indeed Legendary; however, the Legendary Snowball event you're referring to does not begin unil December 23, 2015. I'm sorry if there was a misunderstanding. For more information about the events including dates and restrictions, check out the Snowdown page at http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/look-out-its-snowdown
welp, at least i have a kickass dragon
